channel.title: General on Bailey Atwood

item.title: Project Yukon: Overview
item.description: A New Beginning Originally, I started posting “devlog-like” posts on a Discord server for the game. However, as time has gone on, leaving all of my development logs and messages on a single platform I don’t have complete control over hasn’t seemed like a good idea. I would hate for all the development notes and such to be locked on Discord or worse be lost if the server or Discord itself goes away.
